sentences.sentence: In a time when we really don't see many miraculous things – or maybe we do, maybe they're all right there around us, every day, and we just don't know where to look.
sentences.translation: 有一段时间里，我们似乎没看到什么神奇的事情，但或许我们看到了。也许奇迹就在我们平常生活的每一天里，我们只不过不知道该去关注什么。

sentences.sentence: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
sentences.translation: 能改变生活的只有我自己，没有人能替我改变。

sentences.sentence: Sometimes it is better to lose and do the right thing than to win and do the wrong thing.
sentences.translation: 有时候做对的事而输，比做错的事而赢还要好。

sentences.sentence: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret.
If many fail me, I remember how many I failed.
sentences.translation: 如果众人辜负我，我会记得自己曾辜负了多少人。
